title: What is one of the best 5G companies to invest in? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I mentioned in another reply, there are several companies worth investing in. The easiest way would be to buy shares of an EFT such as First Trust Indxx NextG ETF and Defiance Next Gen Connectivity ETF. In terms of companies, I would look for infrastructure companies (think REITs like American Tower), service providers (AT&T, for example) and chip makers (Qualcomm). Here is a comprehensive guide on 5G investing, which goes into details about which companies to check out: Investing in 5G: a comprehensive guide - Compounding Works!
